com.genband.mobile.api.services.im

Interface BaseImInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IncomingImInterface, OutgoingImInterface

    public interface BaseImInterface
    Interface definition for defining instant message methods for getting and sending message, from address, to address and client info
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getCharSet()
      Returns charset value of the IM message.
      java.lang.String getClientType()
      Returns client type, which is a String used to identify the receiving client type such as "A2","Facebook".
      java.lang.String getFromAddress()
      Returns fromAddress of Instant Message.
      java.lang.String getMessage()
      Returns text of Instant Message.
      java.lang.String getOriginatorDisplayName()
      Returns originator display name of Instant Message.
      java.lang.String getRemoteParty()
      Returns remote party information of the IM message.
      java.lang.String getTerminatorDisplayName()
      Returns terminator display name of Instant Message.
      java.lang.String getToAddress()
      Returns toAddress of Instant Message.
      void setCharSet(java.lang.String charSet)
      Sets charset value of the IM message.
      void setClientType(java.lang.String clientType)
      Sets client type, which is a String used to identify the receiving client type such as "A2","Facebook".
      void setFromAddress(java.lang.String fromAddress)
      Sets fromAddress of Instant Message.
      void setMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Sets text of Instant Message.
      void setOriginatorDisplayName(java.lang.String originatorDisplayName)
      Sets originator display name of Instant Message.
      void setTerminatorDisplayName(java.lang.String terminatorDisplayName)
      Sets terminator display name of Instant Message.
      void setToAddress(java.lang.String toAddress)
      Sets toAddress of Instant Message.
